author: SeaswimmerTheFsh
install_msg:
Thank you for installing SugonCredit!
**Please load the Bank cog before loading this cog.**
You can find the source code of this cog here: https://github.com/SeaswimmerTheFsh/GalaxyCogs.
name: SugonCredit
description: Implements a way for moderators to give out social-credit like points, dubbed 'sugoncredits' by the community.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores no end user data.
